TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_malawlaw, title = malawlaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/malawlaw} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:心急如焚) malawlaw nu heni kami a mapulung. 我們都被他們吵到.
(kamo no holam:心急如焚) malawlaw no heni kami a mapolong. 我們都被他們吵到.
